name: POC_DME
description: This table contains durable medical equipment (DME) information for the Plan of Care (POC) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: POC_DME_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item contains the DME type.

columns.name: POC_DME_START_DT
columns.description: This item contains the start date of episode DMEs as of the time the POC was saved.

columns.name: POC_DME_END_DT
columns.description: This item contains the end date of episode DMEs as of the time the POC was saved.

columns.name: POC_DME_CMT
columns.description: This item contains the comments for episode DMEs as of the time the POC was saved.

columns.name: POC_DME_DELETED_YN
columns.description: This item contains the deleted status for episode DMEs as of the time the POC was saved.

columns.name: HSPC_COVERED_C_NAME
columns.description: The durable medical equipment - hospice coverage category ID for the plan of care.

columns.name: HSPC_NONCVRD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The durable medical equipment - hospice not covered reason category ID for the plan of care.

columns.name: HSPC_NONCVRD_RSN_C_CMT
columns.description: The durable medical equipment - hospice not covered reason category comment for the plan of care.
